name: portfolio-ibaifernandez
description: Local quality and E2E tooling for portfolio-ibaifernandez

scripts.media:avif: node scripts/generate-avif-assets.mjs index.html blog.html && node scripts/wrap-images-with-avif-picture.mjs index.html blog.html
scripts.media:webp: node scripts/generate-webp-assets.mjs index.html blog.html && node scripts/wrap-images-with-avif-picture.mjs index.html blog.html
scripts.media:all: npm run media:avif && npm run media:webp
scripts.test: npm run test:quality && npm run test:e2e
scripts.test:ci: npm run test:quality && npm run test:smoke && npm run test:e2e
